properties.name: custom.inventory.max-inventory-space
properties.description: Maximum space available for a single inventory.

properties.name: custom.alert.auto-reorder
properties.description: Enable or disable automatic stock reordering.

properties.name: custom.alert.low-stock
properties.description: Enable or disable low stock alerts.

properties.name: custom.alert.expiry-check-interval-ms
properties.description: Interval for periodic expiry checks in milliseconds.

properties.name: custom.supplier.generate-random-password
properties.description: Generate random password for suppliers users on creation.
